cont.entity_a: Compatible with laptops from 2005 onwards, but not with older models. Not compatible with certain modem encryptions, requiring password protection to be turned off. Some compatibility issues with older operating systems and WPA security. Can be used with older Mac laptops as an AirPort card with WPA Personal.
cont.entity_b: Reliable network card with good range and support for latest encryption methods.

cont.entity_a: Installation is straightforward, requiring only driver installation. Installation process is easy, with clear instructions for setting up. Offers a straightforward installation process with good documentation.
cont.entity_b: Installation on Windows XP and Ubuntu was quick and easy. Installation with CD was quick, with superb connection quality.

cont.entity_a: Achieves speeds of up to 54 Mbps near the router, decreasing with distance and obstructions. Offers a solid connection at decent speeds for a Wireless G card. Does not meet the latest WiFi standards but works with most public and home systems.
cont.entity_b: Not faster in N-mode compared to Cisco's G-mode, despite higher transmission speed claims.

cont.entity_a: Signal strength can vary significantly without any changes in setup. Signal strength may be lower than expected compared to older cards in the same location. Maintains a strong connection even at a distance from the router.
cont.entity_b: Loses connection frequently, even when close to the router. Worst range experienced compared to older cards. Stability issues with frequent disconnections.

cont.entity_a: Highly durable and efficient for prolonged use.
Setup can be problematic with certain operating systems and requires specific installation steps to avoid conflicts. Works well with Linux, but may require additional setup for obscure distributions.
cont.entity_b: Management software included did not work, requiring manual setup. Worked immediately on Linux Mint without tweaking.

cont.entity_a: The extension part of the card protrudes slightly from the laptop.
cont.entity_b: Fits well into the Express slot with a secure connection.

cont.entity_a: Very affordable price for the value provided.

cont.entity_b: TrendNet's customer service is responsive and helpful.
